Title: New Normal
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Meredith Stiehm, Charlotte Stoudt, Charlotte Stoudt (executive story editor)
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Sebastian Koch, Miranda Otto
Plot: While the questioning of Alison continues, the footage of Quinn is being released with threats and demands, and the search for the responsible individuals begins, all hands on deck.
